FuncDef:
The set offline-check disable command disables the function to use the OFL (offline) button to power on and off a board.
The undo offline-check disable command restores the function to use the OFL button to power on and off a board.
By default, the OFL button can be used to power on and off a board.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a high-temperature and high-humidity environment, the small circuit card of the OFL button may be short-circuited and causes the board to reset repeatedly. After the function to use the OFL button to power on and off the board is disabled, some faults can be quickly recovered. You can choose to enable or disable the function.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
After the function is disabled, the board does not respond to the OFL button.
